Bloomington.The Museum of Russian Art:
The Museum of Russian Art (TMORA) is a museum in Minneapolis, Minnesota, United States, that houses a collection of Russian art from the 20th century, especially Soviet art. Additionally, it often hosts temporary exhibitions of art and artifacts with more general connections to Russian-speaking world.


== Details ==
The museum was incorporated as a 501(c)-3 non-profit corporation in 2001.
